Reduces incoming damage. Stacks with other forms of damage reduction.
attribute.name.generic.healing_reduction: Incoming healing will be reduced by this value.
attribute.name.generic.health_regenerati: Extra health regeneration in points per second. This is ticked separately outside of natural health regeneration.
attribute.name.generic.projectile_damage: Reduces incoming damage from projectiles. Stacks with other forms of damage reduction.
attribute.name.generic.safe_fall_distanc: Distance you can fall before fall damage starts accumulating.
attribute.name.player.extra_fortune_leve: Every points increases the odds to get extra drops from ores (similar to Fortune enchantment).
effect.adjcore.lesser_instant_health.des: Instantly replenishes a small amount of lost health
